name: JoJo Siwa - Live to Dance
description:
Hey Siwanatorz! Enter the colorful and sparkly world of JoJo Siwa and get ready to dance your heart out. Live out your dream on stage, and rise to the top with JoJo and BowBow!

MOVE LIKE JOJO
-Learn various dance styles like jazz, hip-hop and signature moves from JoJo.
-Earn fashion and style tips on the way to the big stage.

CUSTOMIZE
-Design and customize your own JoJo-inspired bows!
-Change up your look and get camera-ready with makeup and hairstyles in the salon.
-Complete your look with dozens of style options, including outfits from JoJo’s closet and tour!

JOIN THE TOUR
-Enter the colorful and positive world of JoJo Siwa and join her dance tour across the USA!
-Audition, train, compete and perform with JoJo on stage!
-Complete missions and collect bows to gain experience as you dance, dance, dance!
